By January of 1952 the network achieved its
present operation^level. The average monthly tape
production increased to l,06l reels. There were now
12 tflegsn. average monthly air time increased to
1,231 hours. This indicates the scope of the operation
at the time of this repxort.
* Throughout this report tTAir Time" indicates the following
computation: total running time of all programs distributed
multiplied by the number of stations using the programs.
Includes only regular series. Does not include extra
programs or in-school programs.
